name: A0 Enhanced Agent System
description: Multi-agent orchestration platform with Venice.ai, AgentMail, and Claude Code
readme:
# A0 Enhanced - RunPod Template

Deploy the complete A0 agent system with one click.

## Features
- 25+ specialized AI agents
- Venice.ai integration
- AgentMail SDK
- PostgreSQL memory system
- Claude Code pre-installed

## Required Environment Variables
- ANTHROPIC_API_KEY
- OPENAI_API_KEY  
- VENICE_API_KEY
- AGENTMAIL_API_KEY

env.description: Your Anthropic API key for Claude access
Your AgentMail API key for email automation
